# GLASS: Generator for Large Scale Structure

## Overview

::: {layout-nrow="2"}

::: {.cell}

GLASS, the generator for large scale structure, is a library for performing the
kind of simulation that is useful in the field of cosmology.

:::

::: {.cell}
